summary: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewelry store.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|Yueh Sun|Danny Lee|Carrie Ng|Roy Cheung|Kong Lau|Elvis Tsui|Yeh Fang|Chi Fai Chan|Mang-Ha Cheng|Parkman Wong|Bo-San Chow|Victor Hon|Kwong Leung Wong|Maria Cordero|Joseph Chi|Ka-Kui Ho|Hong-Ning Ng|Chi-Shing Chan|Wing-Wai Chin|Ringo Lam|Chi-Mun Ho|Kwok-Kin Ng|Pak Fei|Yuen-Tat Chan|Yung Chan|Chi Man Ho|Yik-Ming Ho|Tom Konkle|Chi-Ming Lau|Sai-Shing Shum|Michael Sorich|Yu-Wah Szeto|Chien-wen Yang
title: City on Fire
